-  UIImage.SymbolVariableValueMode 

Enumeration# UIImage.SymbolVariableValueMode

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
enum SymbolVariableValueMode
```

## [Topics](/documentation/UIKit/UIImage/SymbolVariableValueMode#topics)

### [Enumeration Cases](/documentation/UIKit/UIImage/SymbolVariableValueMode#Enumeration-Cases)

[`case automatic`](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/symbolvariablevaluemode/automatic)Automatically selects an appropriate variable value mode for the symbol.[`case color`](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/symbolvariablevaluemode/color)The “color” variable value mode. Sets the opacity of each variable layer to either on or off depending on how its threshold compared to the current value.[`case draw`](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/symbolvariablevaluemode/draw)The “draw” variable value mode. Changes the drawn length of each variable layer to either based on how its range relates to the current value.### [Initializers](/documentation/UIKit/UIImage/SymbolVariableValueMode#Initializers)

[`init?(rawValue: Int)`](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/symbolvariablevaluemode/init(rawvalue:))## [Relationships](/documentation/UIKit/UIImage/SymbolVariableValueMode#relationships)
